message: Check that the title element describes the document.
selector: html > head > title

message: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
selector: html

message: This table appears to be a layout table. If it is meant to instead be a data table, ensure header cells are identified using th elements.

message: Check that this element has an inherited foreground colour to complement the corresponding inline background colour or image.
